synopsis.text: Tanpei and Junko, two young lab assistants, find themselves in an unexpected predicament when their boss, the brilliant Dr. Keida, vanishes during a test run of his groundbreaking invention, the Time Bokan. The time machine, which proved its capabilities by traveling through time and space in mere minutes, returns to its original spot with only a talking parrot and a diamond in its cockpit, leaving the lab assistants in a state of bewilderment. With no time to waste, the duo embarks on a thrilling and unpredictable journey through time, determined to find their missing mentor who is lost somewhere in the vast expanse of history.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
